description: Modules deferred for future implementation. These represent future capabilities that are not yet prioritized.

modules.description: UI showing the same loop at different zoom levels (module/system/org). Music-gear-like looping interfaces for piloting, co-piloting, or playing co-op PvE with the orchestrator.
modules.notes: Requires dashboard foundation to be solid first

modules.description: Macroscopic technology progressions that cultures/orgs pursue. Predictive capabilities (potentially RL-based like AlphaGo with Markov decision trees) that inspire MECE opportunity mapping at system and module levels.
modules.notes: May be superseded by skill-trees for most use cases

modules.description: System for enforcing/guaranteeing LLM behavior. AGENT.md files define agent personalities, constraints, and behavioral rules. Explicit rules enforcement patterns for ensuring consistent agent behavior across Layer 2 agents.
modules.notes: Partially implemented in GuaranteeService for skill guarantees. AGENT.md exploration included — configuration format for per-agent behavior definitions.

modules.description: Multi-engineer loop coordination. Transform the single-player loops experience into multiplayer: command parsing across engineers, thread management per engineer, merge/rebase workflows, engineer status tracking, and cross-worktree coordination.
modules.notes: Foundation exists in slack-integration, needs consolidation

modules.description: Voice input and output for piloting the orchestrator. Naturalistic speech for contexts where you can't hold long documents in your head (driving, jogging). Dictate requirements, hear status.
modules.notes: Voice output service exists, needs voice input

modules.description: Special patterns and loops for brownfield contexts. Making orchestrator as good at brownfield as it is at greenfield.
modules.notes: Essential for getting systems to completion for launch or checkpoint

modules.description: Full loop for creating business model artifacts. Structured exploration of value proposition, revenue streams, cost structure, channels.
Full loop for GTM strategy artifacts. Market analysis, positioning, launch planning, channel strategy.
Domain loop for marketing workflows. Content creation, campaign management, audience development, analytics.
Constructed environments providing domain ontology (vocabulary, entities, operations, workflows, shared concepts). KnoPilot is reference implementation.
modules.notes: KnoPilot service is the first runtime context

modules.description: Collaborative ontology building across multiple users, multiple AI agents, and user+AI combinations. Includes skill merging (combining skills from different sources) and load-your-own-skills (importing external skill libraries). Creating multiple ontologies with different participant combinations.
Collecting and organizing tools, patterns, frameworks, skills, and loops across the ecosystem. Ensuring nothing useful is orphaned.
Architecture ensuring orchestrator works without internet. Encryption, sync protocols, and security for the journey from local to public apps. The foundation for true ownership.

Sleep/background processing mode using ADIR reasoning cycle (Abductive→Deductive→Inductive→Reflexive) to propose improvements. Produces Context Deltas (keep/discard/add/reweight/next_tests/guardrails) while idle, ready for review when you return.
modules.notes: Service exists but not production-ready. ADIR (PAT-012) provides the meta-cognitive reasoning engine. Passive mode counterpart to learning-loop's active ADIR integration.

modules.description: Framing the dream state ladder as finite games with clear win conditions. Understanding the infinite game the org plays.
Wake up to decks ready for review: knowledge decks for spaced repetition, project proposal decks for autonomous execution.
SRS for skill mastery and knowledge retention with SM-2 algorithm.
Click into each skill to see its step-by-step process, chat with it, see relevant docs.
modules.notes: Interactive skill exploration and debugging interface

modules.description: Behavior guardrails and value alignment for agent actions.
modules.notes: Builds on guarantee and coherence infrastructure

modules.description: Deep context gathering tool (slow but thorough).
modules.notes: Complements quick context tools with exhaustive analysis

modules.description: Print context questions for multiple roadmap modules simultaneously.
Org-level event task queue, roundtable council through single portal.
Ability to remix/fork existing loops with modifications.
Plugins and effects that affect just that specific loop instance.
Recipes for common documentation patterns.
Generative UI/UX for dynamic interface generation.
Loop for user adoption workflows and onboarding sequences.
Log and analyze prompts across the system.
Theory of constraints, More/Better/New, MoSCoW, and other decision frameworks.

Integration layer braiding together skill-trees, inbox-processor, and knowledge-graph-ontology. Unified skill acquisition pipeline: capture knowledge from inbox, map relationships in graph, track progression through trees, recommend learning paths based on graph clusters, surface gaps between captured content and mastered skills.
modules.notes: Higher-order module that unifies the three skill primitives into cohesive mastery system

modules.description: Serialization format and service for passing execution context between agents. Bundles current execution state, relevant memory, active patterns, and calibration data into a portable package that Layer 2 agents can load to resume work seamlessly.
modules.notes: Critical for multi-agent handoff. Currently no standard way to pass state between spawned agents.

modules.description: Visual kanban board for the dashboard showing module status across the 7-layer hierarchy. Module cards with status indicators (complete, in-progress, pending, blocked), leverage scoring panel, progress visualization, and dependency view.
modules.notes: SKILL.md spec exists but component not built. Roadmap API exists but no interactive board UI.

modules.description: Git worktree management for parallel module development. Collaborator registration, resource reservations, merge queue, and conflict detection.
modules.notes: Infrastructure exists (24 tools, 23+ endpoints) but not wired to OrchestrationService or ExecutionEngine. Needs integration to be usable.

modules.description: Layer 1 persistent orchestrator spawns Layer 2 ephemeral agents for parallel work. Work distribution, concurrency modes, failure handling cascade.
modules.notes: Framework complete (17 tools, 15 endpoints) but agents don't run loops. ExecutionEngine not wired, auto-merge disabled, no crash recovery.

modules.description: Per-loop and per-phase transient file configuration. Allows loops to declare file retention policies, deliverable vs transient intent, phase-level cleanup strategies, and skill file declarations.
modules.notes: Foundation exists (3-tier storage, cleanup, checkpoints). Missing: loop.json schema for fileManagement config, phase-level cleanup hooks, skill output declarations. Retention policies now wired up (archiveOldRuns called on completion).
